rename.from: Annotate Action into Dataset opens wrong document when frontend have to paginate
rename.to: Annotate button lead to the different document after pagination

body: Thanks for the GIF. It easy to understand the problem.

I was trying to fix this bug and I guess this should be made in order to fix.

`DocumentsList.vue`
```
goToAnnotationPage(doc) {
    const index = this.items.findIndex(item => item.id === doc.id)
    const limit = this.options.itemsPerPage
    const offset = (this.options.page - 1) * limit
    const q = this.search
    this.updateSearchOptions({ limit, offset, q })
    this.$router.push('/projects/' + this.$route.params.id + '/' + this.getLink)
    this.setCurrent(index)
    const checkpoint = {}
    checkpoint[this.$route.params.id] = index + 1 // maybe it should be **index + offset + 1**
    localStorage.setItem('checkpoint', JSON.stringify(checkpoint))
}
```

 but after that I stuck into 2 endpoint calls that I can't find where they are being made. This calls are set without any query parameters and, by default, the right data is replaced by the first `n=limit` elements.

Do you know where to find this calls?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42852567/86043397-12c6ea80-ba1f-11ea-829d-fbda71a7be70.png)

I found the calls are performed from `Paginator.vue` and `BottomNavigator.vue`

https://github.com/doccano/doccano/blob/dbbf6d65b064a09381c70915b1ca9533c472a063/frontend/components/containers/annotation/Paginator.vue#L108-L110

https://github.com/doccano/doccano/blob/dbbf6d65b064a09381c70915b1ca9533c472a063/frontend/components/containers/annotation/BottomNavigator.vue#L62-L64

issue.title: bug: fix to bug #850. Now is possible to open documents from other pages

repository.name: doccano

issue.title: Known issue about Annotation UI

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
**Please read this issue when you faced the problem of annotation user interface.**  
**If you faced the following issue, please upvote üëç related issue that let us judge priority.**

* Display
  * [x] Nonworking delete button is shown for labels of other users #866
  * [x] Feature Request: Keep and Display the new line in the Text Classification Task #879
  * [x] RTL language Support #769
  * [x] Can't change from "Checked" to "Not Checked"? #481
* Filter
  * [x] Done / Undone filter does not work correctly #808
  * [x] After filtering the dataset when clicking the annotation it is not shown the proper data (from the filter) #765
  * [x] Choosing filter twice results in 404 error #754
  * [x] The display of the document index does not change after filtering #594
* Pagination
  - [x] Pagination unresponsive for large documents #873 
  - [x] Execute refresh above the pagination-boundary example causes miss ordering #804 
* File upload
  - [x] Make upload file constraints more clearly #521
  - [x] [Enhancement request] Allow to import unlabeled datasets #658
  - [x]  Unable to import CoNLL files #1046

body: @Hironsan , @br-dr3 , as #868 has been reverted, reopen, please.
Any fix to that should test #887 #888 scenario.

issue.title: Fix pagination and transition issues

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
closes #890 
- Now that doccano can keep the state of all the projects.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6737785/87644993-d669ed00-c787-11ea-8924-3e407bb90313.png)

closes #850 
![](https://gyazo.com/dbb79ed643c94f85de0017759ad01e91/raw)

closes #804 
![](https://gyazo.com/0400becea09beee98ca5491a1826fbac/raw)

closes #765 
![](https://gyazo.com/5ba7091481adaeec7bde7404cb49b798/raw)

closes #595 
- In dataset page, the URL is changed to `/projects/1/dataset?limit=10&offset=0&q=`.
- In annotation page, the URL is changed to `/projects/1/text-classification?isChecked=false&page=1&q=`.

closes #594 
- Now, the index is shown correctly excluding the case when documents are empty after filtering. In the case, `1/0` is shown.

closes #540 
- Now that we can specify page by id.

body: I made a PR #897 drastically changed pagination and transition.
I pull the latest repo but find that the annotate button still leads to a different document, in my existing project. Am I missing anything? thanks.

issue.title: Enable to search documents for annotators

repository.name: doccano
repository.description: Open source annotation tool for machine learning practitioners.

issue.body:
How can I access to the search function when annotating (like previous UI version)?
---------
First of all, thank you for your project.

I'm doing a project similar to Seq2Seq annotation style, but need to constantly revise annotated data. As such, I need to quickly navigate between documents. However, with the current UI version, I can only filter by complete/incomplete documents. Is there anyway to search specific documents by text?
